summary: Small retexture of the Heavy Falmer Armor.
descriptionHtml:
This changes the texture of the Heavy Falmer Armor and the Shellbug Helmet:
- the armor itself is a bit darker
- the chitin-parts are now grey/silver colored

Requirements:
- Dawnguard

Installation:
- Extract the file to your Skyrim main directory.

Sorry for the horrible texture quality in the screenshots; due to performance issues, I had to reduce the graphic settings. Don't worry, the new textures have the same quality like the vanilla ones.
author: Scatty92
